name: Emergency Pet Vet Doctor 2017 - Crazy Animal Game
name_original: Emergency Pet Vet Doctor 2017 - Crazy Animal Game
description:
Emergency Pet Vet Doctor 2017 is an Animal Surgery Simulation game. There are two animal patients one is cute puppy and second one is the fluffy cat, in this Free Animal Doctor game. Take care of these pets and make them perfect again.

Join Emma’s Pet clinic as a doctor, perform all surgeries and operation to recover pets. There are many adorable puppies, fluffy cats and treat injured dogs. Rescue all the zoo animals and become a professional vet surgeon. Emergency Pet Vet Doctor 2017 Animal Surgery Simulation game is a Free game.

FEATURES:
- Heal the sick pets and animals
- Treat injured puppies and kitties
- Clean up messy cats and dogs
- Perform treatment and Operations
- Feed your little cute pets
- Dress-up with unlimited outfit combination
- Realistic Animal Theme
- Different Levels
- Act like a Real Doctor
- Make your Pets Happy
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- Easy Game play
- No In App Purchases
- No Internet required
and much more...

Emergency Pet Vet Doctor Surgery Simulator game in role playing and Casual games, Surgery games category!
